_header: Saint Gregory the confessor in Sicily was I-bore
Subjects: saints’ lives; Gregory, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Gregory in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEyn Gregori þe confessour in cicile was iboreIn holinesse he
                    ladde is lif þat is soule nere uorlore …
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Bidde we him wiþ gode herte apostel of engelondeþat
                    he byuore our lord crist our neode vnderstonde

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint gregor þe comfessour in sysile was I boreIm haynesse he
                    ladde his lyf þat he ne were forlore…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…bidde we him wit good hert apostil of ingelondeÞat to
                    fore oure lord crist he bere oure erande

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
SEint Gregori þe Confessour in Cisyle was i boreIn holinesse
                    he ladde his lyf þat his soule ne were forlore…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Bidde we him wiþ gode herte Apostel of EngelondeÞat
                    he bi fore vr lord crist vr neode vndurstonde AM.EN.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
SEint Gregori þe confessour in Ciscile was i boreIn holienesse
                    he ladde is liif þat is soule nere for lore…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…Bidde we þanne þene holie man apostle of
                    EngelondeÞat he bi fore ihesu crist ore neode ounder
                    stonde
BodLauMis108.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             The Early South-English Legendary.
EETS
         o.s. 87 (1887; repr. 1987): 355-9.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint Gregory þe confessour In Cicyle was y boreIn holinesse
                    he lad his lyf þat his soule nere forlore…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…Bidde we him with god herte apostel of engelondþat he
                    bifore oure lord crist oure nede vnderstonde
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

BodRawPoe225.First Lines:
ffor he sente vs our cristin dom h[ ]þat men vsin ȝit
                    with oute les[ ]…
BodRawPoe225.Last Lines:
…þat he be fore our lord ihesuoure nede he
                    vndirstonde

BodTan17.First Lines:
SEint Gregori þe confessour In Cisile was I boreIn almesse he
                    ledde his liif þat his soule were not lore…
BodTan17.Last Lines:
…Bidde we him wiþ good herte þe apostle of
                    IngelondÞat he to oure lord crist oure nede vndirstond

OxfCCC431.First Lines:
[S]eint Gregori þe confessor in Cicile was iboreIn holynesse
                    he ladde his lif for his [s]oule ne scholde be forlo[re]…
OxfCCC431.Last Lines:
…Now bidde we þan apostel of engelondeþat he bifore
                    oure lord crist oure nede vnderstonde
OxfCCC431.Note: Portion of text lost due to mutilation of leaves.

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Sein gregori confessour in cisile was iboreIn holynesse he ladde is
                    lif þat is soule nere ilore…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…Bidde we him wiþ gode heorte apostel of
                    EngelondeÞat he to vore oure louerd crist our neode vnder
                    stonde
CamCCC145.Editions:
D’Evelyn,  Charlotte,  and  A. J. Mill, eds.  
             The South English Legendary: Corpus Christi College Cambridge MS. 145
                and British Museum MS. Harley 2277, with variants from Bodley MS. Ashmole 43 and
                British Museum MS. Cotton Julius D.ix.
EETS
         o.s. 235 (1959), 236 (1956); repr. 1967: 1.81-4.

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint Gregori þe confessour in Cysile was yboreIn holynesse he
                    ladde his lif and clene ffram alle hore…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Bydde we wiþ goede heorte to him þat Apostoyle is of
                    EngelondeÞat he by ffore oure lord crist oure neode
                    vnderstonde

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint gregory þe confessoure in cicille was y borein holynesse
                    he ladde his lyf þat he nere for lore…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…bydde we hym myldelyche apostel of englondeþat he to
                    oure lord criste oure nede vnderstonde

BLAdd10301.First Lines:
SEin gregory þe confessor in Cysile was y boreIn holynesse he
                    ladde is lyf þat is soule ner for lore…
BLAdd10301.Last Lines:
…Praye we him wiþ gode herte apostel of engelondeþat
                    he to fore oure lord crist oure nede vnder stonde
BLAdd10301.Attributed Title:
De sancto Gregorio (f. 39, by scribe in margin beside first line);
                        Gregorio (RT)

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEint gregori þe confessour in cisile was iboreIn holinesse he ladde his lif þat his soule nere forlore…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …bidde we him with gode herte apostel of englondþat he afore oure lord crist our nede vnþerstonde
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum xx” added to right margin by later hand (f. 35).
BLCottJulDIX.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library  Cotton Julius MS D IX.
         https://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?ref=Cotton_MS_Julius_D_IX.

BLEge1993.First Lines: Seint Gregorie þe confessour in Cisile was iboreIn holinesse he liuede þat is soule nere forlore…
BLEge1993.Last Lines: …Bidde we him wiþ gode herte apostel of engelondeÞat he to vore oure lord crist oure nede vnderstonde

BLEge2810.First Lines: SEynt Gregori þe confessour in cisil was yboreIn holinysse he ladde is lif þat is soule nere vorlore…
BLEge2810.Last Lines: …Bidde we hym wiþ gode herte apostil of engelondeþat he tovore oure louird crist oure noede vndirstonde

BLEge2891.First Lines: SEin Grigori þe confessour in cisile was yboreIn holynesse he ladde is lyf þat is soule nere forlore…
BLEge2891.Last Lines: …Bidde we him wiþ gode heorte apostel of engelondeþat he tofore oure louerd crist oure neode vnder stonde
BLEge2891.Attributed Title: De sancto gregorio (rubric in margin, f. 22v)

Lam223.First Lines:
SAynt Gregorye þe Confessour in Cisill was he bornIn holynesse
                    he lad his lyf to save his soule vnlorn…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…And þer is called saynt gregory Apostel of
                    EnglondÞonked be god & saynt gregory of his swete sond
                    Amen

Kendal.Transcription:
…Wals was to þe roch com þe fissers him fettred & fast
                    londPokay was wel son nom & in þe see cast to
                    ground…
Kendal.Note: Corresponds to lines 127-92 and 572-635 of version found in Oxford,  Bodleian Library Eng. poet. a.1 (SC 3938) [Vernon MS]. Formerly on cover, now end flyleaves.

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seynt Gregory þe confessour in Cicile was boreIn holynes he
                    lad his lif þat his soule ner nat lore…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…Prey we hym wiþ good herte postel of EngelondeÞat
                    he tofore our lord Crist our erand vnderstonde. Amen.
